summary: Provides an extensible framework for generating descriptive representations of CKAN configuration declarations in multiple formats (dictionary, JSON, YAML, TOML, Python). It defines an abstract workflow, concrete describers for each format, and a registration mechanism for custom describers, enabling roundâ€‘trip serialization of configuration schemas.
business_intent: Enable developers to document, serialize, and validate configuration schemas consistently across different file formats, supporting tooling, documentation generation, and future reloading of the original configuration declaration.
